sentences: Tark robot aitab meid igapäevastes töödes.
Vaimne võib tulla välja nagu robot.
context: In Estonian, 'robot' refers to a mechanical or virtual artificial agent that can perform tasks automatically. It's borrowed from English and has the same meaning as in English - a programmable machine capable of carrying out complex series of actions automatically. The word can be used in singular form (robot) or plural form (robodid).
